summary: Six ordinary Matoran are chosen to become Toa, guardians of the legendary city of Metru Nui. But as they accustom to their new role, conflicts quickly arise between them, and a sinister plot is set in motion right under their noses.
cast: Christopher Gaze|Michael Dobson|Paul Dobson|Tabitha St. Germain|Brian Drummond|Trevor Devall|Alessandro Juliani|Gerard Plunkett|Lee Tockar
title: Bionicle: leyendas de metru nui
